input_args.instruction: "Context: Variant rs11209026 associates with both ankylosing spondylitis and Crohn's disease. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Variant is associated with ankylosing spondylitis and Crohn's disease. Given list is:  rs219780, rs11209026,  rs1233491, rs1953126,  rs2294008"
